articles.author: Wayne Smith
articles.title: NASA solar sail technology passes crucial deployment test - Phys.org
articles.description: In his youth, NASA technologist Les Johnson was riveted by the 1974 novel "The Mote in God's Eye," by Jerry Pournelle and Larry Niven, in which an alien spacecraft propelled by solar sails visits humanity. Today, Johnson and a NASA team are preparing to test …
